name: Grilled Peaches (+6 different topping ideas!)
description: Juicy grilled peaches with 6 different topping ideas! Learn how to grill peaches and add our delicious sweet or savory topping ideas.
ingredients: Olive oil, for brushing the peaches
Vanilla bean ice cream of choice
instructions: Preheat your grill to medium high heat or about 400 degrees F. Brush peach halves with olive oil to prevent them from sticking to the grill. *For the Cinnamon Brown Sugar topping: mix the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon together and spread over peaches before grilling.Place peach halves flesh-side down on the grill and cook for 3-4 minutes or until grill marks form. Only grill one side until the peaches are slightly juicy. Remove peach halves from the grill and serve with your desired toppings.**For the Lemon Ricotta Pistachio topping: mix lemon, ricotta and salt together, then place on grilled peaches and top with pistachios, a drizzle of honey, and basil OR a few arugula pieces.This serves 4, but feel free to double the recipe or cut in half for a smaller serving. Enjoy!
